body_html:
Hi all,

Request for a feature: Is there a function called as separable_conv3d?

I think it is more important in the case of 3D convolutions to be separable. (because it takes lot of memory otherwise)

Could anyone please let me know if it exists?
body_text:
Hi all,

I think it is more important in the case of 3D convolutions to be separable. (because it takes lot of memory otherwise)
Could anyone please let me know if it exists?
body:
Hi all,

Request for a feature: Is there a function called as separable_conv3d? 

I think it is more important in the case of 3D convolutions to be separable. (because it takes lot of memory otherwise) 

Could anyone please let me know if it exists?
